Subject: Heritrix Usage Survey
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=324458274; y=ah92E1cDnBwwqTWEHlz2diSrYaW3iMiuhu7Wte2hBEYOEin5UmytxU0uu0eK
X-Yahoo-Profile: kris_carpenter2002

The Internet Archive recently created a Heritrix Usage survey at:

http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=wduuZtRuecv7PGkL6Cjo8Q_3d_3d

The goal of this survey is to document the breadth and depth of Heritrix 
use cases to facilitate:

1) Communication and collaboration within the user community
2) Testing and verification of new software builds
3) Prioritization of features and bug fixes
4) Ongoing support of prior versions and migration paths to new builds
5) More robust documentation of primary use cases and workflows.

This survey is designed to be filled out in its entirety per Heritrix 
use case. If the person or persons responsible for crawling at your 
institution do not have the time to fill this out more than once, please 
have them provide details only for your primary use case.

The results of this survey will be made anonymous prior to distribution 
to the community to encourage participation.

Thanks in advance for your help in this effort!

The Heritrix Engineering Team
